## Introduction
`IrisTools` provides tools to analyze the `iris` dataset.

## Setup
Install with:
```r
devtools::install_github("yourusername/IrisTools")
library(IrisTools)
```

## Examples
### Calculate Means
```r
means <- calc_iris_means()
print(means)
```

### Plot Measurements
```r
plot_iris()
```

### Summarize Measurements
```r
summary <- summarize_iris()
print(summary)
```
